Summary: Star like changed into cross glowing red green blue.
divs: Sighting Detailsmy friend in anahola hawaii pointed out a big ufo shape object hovering and patrolling everynight appeared to big to be a star then would change shapes into like a cross, i took video with my camera and u could see it hovering and changing colors it apperaed to be dancing around in the sky. im from ohio so i never expierienced anything like this before until i went to hawaiii- so i was laying out on my roof while i was living in wailua hawaii where u could see the whole sky- i could see the big one every night and i noticed that there was usually 2 little ones that appeared to be more red and flasshing -to fast to be satilites- but my friend had told me anahola hawaii was 2nd known for ufo sightings besides roswell new mexico- now i am definatley a believer!! i noticed they are real strong around 4am and are gone by 5:30am but sometimes i seen them as early as 10:30 pm
trends: There have been no other sightings in Anahola
This sighting has never been favorited.
